channel.title: Help a brother out :P
channel.description: Alright so I just put a server online its the exion source and I had a few friends online they werent admins or anything lol and they could ban people.... I have no idea how to fix this a little help? Sorry if this is in the wrong section Im a complete noob when it comes to these kinds of things.

item.title: Help a brother out :P
item.dc:creator: @CatsGoMeow CatsGoMeow
item.description:
@CatsGoMeow wrote:

Welcome to the forums! Sorry but this is the wrong forum, it belongs in server help, try checking your client class in your server for the ban command, add this:

&& playerRights =>2

on to the command, so it will look like this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("banuser") && playerRights >= 2) {

Read full topic
